divs: Sighting Detailslast night I noticed two ufo's off of route 27 in Wiscassett Maine in the south west direction they were both triangular with one light on each point of the triangle "3 lights total on each" if You were on route 27 headed toward Gardiner "town" and looking across toward the camp ground they were in the south west dierection as if you were looking at the pool, they were noticiable for about 1hr from about 10pm-11pm this is the 2nd time I noticed them in this area the 1st time was about two months ago has anyone else noticed these events
Summary: Last night I noticed two UFOs off of route 27 in Wiscassett, Maine.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Wiscasset
There were no other sightings in Wiscasset on or around March 6th 2010
